definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Note the 2x102 degree horizontal beam width.
sentences.chinese: 请注意2x102度水平波束宽度。

sentences.english: The initiation toughness has a linear relationship with stretch zone width in the weldment.
sentences.chinese: 裂纹尖端的延伸区宽度和起裂韧性具有良好的关系。

sentences.english: Check the width and height indications.
sentences.chinese: 检测这部分的宽度和高度。

sentences.english: The road was just enough for two vehicles to pass.
sentences.chinese: 这条路的宽度刚好能让两辆车开过。

sentences.english: The entire image width covers about one-half a degree, about the same angular width as the full moon.
sentences.chinese: 整个图像宽度约半度，相当于一个满月的直径宽度。

sentences.english: The entire image width covers about one-half a degree, about the same angular width as the full moon.
sentences.chinese: 整个图像宽度约半度，相当于一个满月的直径宽度。

sentences.english: The increscent spectral width decreases the spectral beam combining efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 随着光谱宽度的增加，合成的效率明显降低。

sentences.english: The Baleh river is far less wide than it is long.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒河的宽度远不及它的长度。

sentences.english: Ligature glyph widths are divided evenly among the characters they represent.
sentences.chinese: 连字字形宽度以它们代表的字符均匀的划分。

sentences.english: You can adjust the stock width and height, and fix or randomize the colors.
sentences.chinese: 你能够整修股票宽度和高度，和固定或者随机化颜色。

sentences.english: Because of the accuracy requirements of tracking radar, the beam width is very narrow.
sentences.chinese: 跟踪测量雷达因其精度要求，波束宽度很窄。

sentences.english: The width of count time and display style can be set respectively by keyboard .
sentences.chinese: 计数器的计数时间宽度和显示方式由键盘设定。

sentences.english: Its length from occiput to muzzle is greater than the width at the brow.
sentences.chinese: 从枕骨部到吻部的长度大于额头的宽度。

sentences.english: SEMMNS A system-wide limit on the number of semaphores in all semaphore sets.
sentences.chinese: 一个系统宽度限制所有的旗语的旗语号码。

sentences.english: Pieces of material of different breadths .
Apply a 1px outside stroke with #8b8782 color.
